text: The 2017–18 Liga IV Olt was the 50th season of the Liga IV Olt, the fourth tier of the Romanian football league system. The season began on 26 August 2017 and ended on 3 June 2018. == Team changes == ===To Liga IV Olt=== Relegated from Liga III * — Promoted from Liga V Olt * — ===From Liga IV Olt=== Promoted to Liga III * Milcov Relegated to Liga V Olt * — ===Other chages=== * Juventus Slatina, CSȘ Slatina and Romanați Caracal withdrew due to financial problems. * Viitorul Osica de Jos and Recolta Stoicănești were enrolled in the championship due to lack of teams. ==League table== ==Promotion play-off== Champions of Liga IV – Olt County face champions of Liga IV – Argeș County. |} Unirea Bascov promoted to 2018–19 Liga III. ==See also== ===Main Leagues=== * 2017–18 Liga I * 2017–18 Liga II * 2017–18 Liga III * 2017–18 Liga IV ===County Leagues (Liga IV series)=== * 2017–18 Liga IV Alba * 2017–18 Liga IV Arad * 2017–18 Liga IV Argeș * 2017–18 Liga IV Bihor * 2017–18 Liga IV Galați * 2017–18 Liga IV Hunedoara * 2017–18 Liga IV Mureș * 2017–18 Liga IV Prahova * 2017–18 Liga IV Suceava * 2017–18 Liga IV Teleorman ==References== ==External links== * Official website Category:Liga IV seasons Category:Sport in Olt County
title: 2017–18 Liga IV Olt
